name: Pumpkin Pancakes
keywords: buttermilk, flour, pumpkin purée, dessert, fall, nut-free, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the flours, baking powder, salt, sugar and cinnamon together in a bowl. Beat the egg, melted butter and pumpkin together and add them along with the buttermilk to make a batter that is a little thicker than the buttermilk. Add more buttermilk if necessary.
Heat a large skillet or griddle and brush with butter or cooking oil. When the surface is very hot, fry the pancakes, a few at a time, turning them as they brown on one side to brown on the other.
